page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area includes two small villages {Moss}and{Fenwick.}The surrounding land is used for{farming,}mainly crops but with some pasture for dairy and beef cattle.{Moss}is the older village but {Fenwick}has developed as the land was drained and became farmable. The course of the{River Went}has been altered to avoid the winter flooding of this very flat, low-lying land. One of the farms specialises in horse showing and another pig breeding. The only true industry, the local{ {brickworks}closed in the early 1900s. There is a sewage works for Askern, Moss and Fenwick. Shire horses bred in this area are sold all over the world.
